protocols.Paper_title: Evaluation of direct-to-PCR (D2P) method for molecular diagnosis of infectious diseases.
Methods: other:D2P extraction-free/direct-to-PCR method mentioned as using proprietary buffers to lyse cells directly; specific sample-prep steps (washes, centrifugation, heating) not described on provided pages (pp. 7–12; Discussion sections 4.1–4.2).
other:Comparator methods referenced (Qiagen silica column; KingFisher magnetic bead-based extraction) but without procedural details on provided pages (pp. 7–12; Tables 3–5 and associated text).

protocols.Paper_title: Evaluation of direct-to-PCR (D2P) method for molecular diagnosis of infectious diseases
Methods: other:direct-to-PCR (D2P) extraction-free approach discussed at a high level; no specific sample-prep protocol steps provided in the supplied pages
